trans-unit.source: Represents an entry in either back or forward navigation history.

[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] implements a navigation history service that stores one entry for each piece of content that has been previously navigated to, just like navigation history in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] implementa un servizio di cronologia di navigazione che archivia una voce per ogni parte del contenuto che è stato precedentemente aperto, esattamente come la cronologia di navigazione in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Navigation history comprises two stacks, one that remembers back navigation history, and one that remembers forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Cronologia di navigazione è costituito da due stack, uno che memorizza la cronologia di navigazione all'indietro e uno che memorizza la cronologia di navigazione in avanti.

trans-unit.source: An entry for the current item is added to back navigation history when a forward navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il backup di cronologia di navigazione quando si verifica uno spostamento in avanti viene aggiunta una voce per l'elemento corrente.

trans-unit.source: This occurs in the following situations:
trans-unit.target: Questo errore si verifica nelle situazioni seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The `Navigate` method is called (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: Il `Navigate` metodo viene chiamato (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).

trans-unit.source: The `GoForward` method is called (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: Il `GoForward` metodo viene chiamato (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).

trans-unit.source: The forward button on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] that is displayed from the current navigator ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: Il pulsante Inoltra nel riquadro di spostamento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] visualizzato dallo strumento di navigazione corrente ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Likewise, an entry for the current item is added to forward navigation history before a back navigation occurs, which happens when:
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, una voce per l'elemento corrente viene aggiunta alla cronologia di navigazione in avanti prima che si verifichi una navigazione all'indietro, situazione che si verifica quando:

trans-unit.source: The `GoBack` method is called (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: Il `GoBack` metodo viene chiamato (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).

trans-unit.source: The back button on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] that is displayed from the current navigator ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: Pulsante Indietro nel riquadro di spostamento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] visualizzato dallo strumento di navigazione corrente ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Each entry in back and forward navigation history is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: Ogni voce indietro e della cronologia di navigazione in avanti è un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> object encapsulates information about a particular navigation, including a name for the entry (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>), whether the entry is kept alive (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive%2A>) and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that is navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Source%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetto incapsula informazioni su un particolare spostamento include un nome per la voce (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>), se la voce viene mantenuta attiva (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive%2A>) e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] per il contenuto di destinazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Source%2A>).

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve all the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> objects in back navigation history by enumerating the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetti nella cronologia di navigazione enumerando il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For forward navigation history, you can retrieve all the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> objects by enumerating the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per la cronologia di navigazione in avanti, è possibile recuperare tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetti enumerando il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you need to remove the most recent <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> object from back navigation history, to prevent navigation to it, for example, you can call the `RemoveBackEntry` method (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>), which removes the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> object and returns a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario rimuovere la più recente <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetto dalla cronologia di navigazione all'indietro, per impedire lo spostamento, ad esempio, è possibile chiamare il `RemoveBackEntry` metodo (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>), che rimuove il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetto e restituisce un riferimento a esso.

trans-unit.source: You cannot add <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> objects to navigation history, however, because you can neither instantiate nor derive from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry>, and because no type implements a member to do so.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetti alla cronologia di navigazione, tuttavia, poiché non è possibile creare un'istanza né derivare da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry>, e poiché nessun tipo implementa un membro a tale scopo.

trans-unit.source: However, you can add custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> objects to back navigation history by calling the `AddBackEntry` method (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>); <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object to an internally-created <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> object, which is then added to the back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile aggiungere personalizzato <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> oggetti per eseguire il backup di cronologia di navigazione chiamando il `AddBackEntry` metodo (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>); <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> oggetto da un oggetto creato internamente <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetto, che viene quindi aggiunto alla cronologia di navigazione all'indietro.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the most recent <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> object from the back navigation stack to get the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Source%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come recuperare la più recente <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry> oggetto dallo stack di navigazione all'indietro per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Source%2A> i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The serialization information.
The streaming context.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> class.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is associated with this journal entry.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is associated with this journal entry.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> oggetto associato a questa voce di journal.

trans-unit.source: If one is not associated, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se non è associato, <see langword="null" /> viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the attached property value.
Returns the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive" /> attached property of the journal entry for the specified element.
The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive" /> attached property of the journal entry for the specified element.
The element from which to get the attached property value.
Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name" /> attached property of the journal entry for the specified element.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name" /> attached property of the journal entry for the specified element.
The data that is required to serialize the target object.
The streaming context.
Called when this object is serialized.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive" /> attached property.
Gets or sets the name of the journal entry.
The name of the journal entry.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della voce di journal.

trans-unit.source: Content hosted by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], display navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] that allows users to navigate through back and forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto ospitato da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], visualizzare lo spostamento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] che consente agli utenti di spostarsi avanti e della cronologia di navigazione in avanti.

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for each entry in navigation history depends on which of the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: Il testo visualizzato per ogni voce nella cronologia di navigazione dipende le seguenti porzioni di dati utilizzati per costruire automaticamente un nome della voce della cronologia di navigazione, in ordine di precedenza:

trans-unit.source: The attached <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: L'allegato <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> attributo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] per la pagina corrente

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **JournalEntry.Name**="<xref:System.String>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **JournalEntry.Name**="<xref:System.String>"/>

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nessuno

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> from markup, with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> proprietà per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> dal markup, con un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] utilizzo della proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name" /> attached property.
The element on which to set the attached property value.
<see langword="true" /> to keep the journal entry in memory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.KeepAlive" /> attached property of the specified element.
The element on which to set the attached property value.
The name to be assigned to the attached property.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name" /> attached property of the specified element.
Gets or sets the URI of the content that was navigated to.
The URI of the content that was navigated to, or <see langword="null" /> if no URI is associated with the entry.
trans-unit.target: L'URI del contenuto che è stato aperto, o <see langword="null" /> se nessun URI è associato alla voce.
